Judul: FAKTOR-FAKTOR YANG MEMPENGARUHI WANITA YANG BEROLAHRAGA UNTUK MELANJUTKAN KEANGGOTAAN DI STUDIO KEBUGARAN
Abstrak:
Male and female as the customers of the business tend to have different behavior and
preferences. The increase of fitness studio in urban cities such as Jakarta, Bandung, and
Surabaya has become the trend especially female to exercise in fitness studio since many of
fitness studios target female fitness enthusiasts as their customer. Like any other fitness
centres, fitness studios heavily rely on customer retention for continuous profitability. Many
previous researches study about customer retention on gym or large fitness centres but none
of them discuss about the continous membership in fitness studio and for specifically female
fitness enthusiats. Therefore, this research aims to find out what are the factors that
influencing female fitness enthusiats to continue membership in particular fitness studio.
Researcher has collected data from 204 female fitness enthusiasts who have acquired
membership in fitness studio in Bandung and analyze the data with PLS-SEM to evaluate the
relationship between factors and the intention to continue membership. The result indicates
that social influence and intention to continue exercising in fitness studio have significant
influence for female fitness enthusiasts to continue membership in fitness studio. Whereas
perceived membership price and perceived service quality has no significant effect on the
intention of continuing membership in fitness studio for female fitness enthusiasts.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Nila Armelia Windasari, S.A., MBA., PhD.
Kata Kunci: wanita yang gemar berolahraga, studio kebugaran, melanjutkan keanggotaan, pengaruh sosial, persepsi kualitas layanan
